• Always ask permission for any procedures including vaginal examinations and ensure privacy and confidentiality
(even under emergency situations)
• Remember that many women have experienced sexual assault or past traumatic births. Harsh treatment in
labour can cause a re- experiencing of the assault situation. If kind and supportive care is provide, and the
woman is helped to feel empowered, this can help t
